00020 class FCOLLADA_EXPORT FCDPhysicsRigidConstraintInstance : public FCDEntityInstance
00021 {
00022 private:
00023     DeclareObjectType(FCDEntityInstance);
00024     FCDPhysicsModelInstance* parent;
00025 
00026 public:
00027     FCDPhysicsRigidConstraintInstance(FCDocument* document, FCDPhysicsModelInstance* parent);
00028     virtual ~FCDPhysicsRigidConstraintInstance();
00029 
00030     // Retrieves the parent physics model.
00031     FCDPhysicsModelInstance* GetParent() { return parent; }
00032     const FCDPhysicsModelInstance* GetParent() const { return parent; }
00033 
00034     inline FCDPhysicsRigidConstraint* GetRigidConstraint() { return (FCDPhysicsRigidConstraint*) GetEntity(); }
00035     inline void SetRigidConstraint(FCDPhysicsRigidConstraint* rigidConstraint) { SetEntity((FCDEntity*) rigidConstraint); }
00036 
00037     // FCDEntity override for RTTI-like
00038     virtual Type GetType() const { return PHYSICS_RIGID_CONSTRAINT; }
00039 
00045     virtual FCDEntityInstance* Clone(FCDEntityInstance* clone = NULL) const;
00046 
00047     // Load the geometry instance from the COLLADA document

00049
